title: China’s State Councilor and Foreign Minister on official visit to Algeria Monday
text: China’s State Councilor and Minister of Foreign Affairs Wang Yi on Monday will be on an official visit to Algeria, leading a large delegation. This visit is part of the consolidation of friendship and cooperation relations between the two countries linked by a Comprehensive Strategic Partnership Agreement signed in 2014.Wang Yi will be received by President of the Republic Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune and will meet with the Minister of Foreign Affairs and the National Community Abroad Mr Ramtane Lamamra.The Chinese FM’s visit will be an opportunity to deepen political consultations between the two countries and assess the implementation of the Comprehensive Strategic Partnership Agreement aimed at boosting bilateral cooperation relations, including the economic partnership in basic infrastructure, direct investment in all priority sectors and the fight against the Coronvavirus pandemic. The two sides will discuss also key regional and international issues of common interest.
